|brand = Cisco |model = Meraki MX60 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/14/2012‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Meraki_MX60W |wlclass = AN900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UDX-60016015 |icid = 6961A-60016015 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A0512008 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Applied Micro;APM82181; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1_type_rev = 464 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SLC NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9K8G08U0D-SCB0; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU128M8GE-AC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327;AR8327-BL1A; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:01:73, 00:18:0A |oui = 00:01:73, 88:DC:96
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.08;; |stockos = Linux;3.4.109;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = metal case, heatsink, MIMO |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;SiGe (Skyworks);SE2595L;;3;,,, PCI Gen 2 Frequency Generator for CPU;IDT;ICS9FG104D;;1;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Fitipower;FP6137E;;1;,,, 2A Dual Output Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;TI;TPS54286;;1;,,, 5A Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AOZ1094AI;;1;,,, 16V/4A 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8708EN;;1;,,, Low Voltage Hex Inverter w/ 5V Tolerant Schmitt Trigger Inputs;Fairchild;74LCX14;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, LEDE Project
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 10/24/2022 |fccapprovdate = 04/13/2012 |estreldate = 10/2012 |estprice = 845 |upc = 810979011309 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00CHHXS0S |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9380; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "7016A0512008" and "Rev:1.00" is silkscreened on the board. :This device is manufactured by ''[[Senao]]''. The SoC pictured in the FCC photos appears to be an ''[[Applied Micro]]'' product. :The Wi-Fi module is assumed to be [[Atheros]] based.
:OEM: [[Senao]] (see also [[Meraki MX60]])
The retail price of this device appears to be $845 (USD) • [http://www.meraki.com/buy/cost-calculator#appliances Calc.]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Applied Micro]] APM82181 @800MHz :PowerPC 464 SoC *Storage: 1GB (SLC NAND) Flash *Memory: 512MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9380 :Dual-band 802.11abgn 2.4/5GHz *Network: 5x GbE port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 12V 1.5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://meraki.cisco.com/lib/pdf/meraki_setup_MX60.pdf Hardware Installation Guide] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/meraki/mx60 ''Meraki MX60W'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://www.thesecurityblogger.com/meraki-mx60-mx60w-security-appliance-first-look/ ''Meraki MX60 / MX60W Security Appliance First Look'' on '''The Security Blogger''']
